ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Exp & Seb question -- was Re: AC
ygData.msgSnippet: that s not bad in a group with everyone higher level than you.  i think before the patch it took me about 4 hours to get half a bubble, and the other night i
ygData.messageBody:
that's not bad in a group with everyone higher level than you. i think
before the patch it took me about 4 hours to get half a bubble, and the
other night i got 3/4 bubb in the same time. but now in 54 it is just
extremely slow, worse than 51.

Shada Powa, L54 Wood Elf Minstrel
Tyria Sarkin, L50 High Elf Wizard
<Afterlife> Mithaniel Marr Server


> Compared to what it was - yes, I guess so but I spent 8 hours
> yesterday in
> Sebilis with a full group (granted there were 2 54's, another
> who became 54,
> 1 53, 1 52 and me 51) for 1 bubble of exp. (sigh)
